pull.title: Trivial: fix references to share/rpcuser (now share/rpcauth)
pull.body:
Commit 3fdb297 renamed share/rpcuser to share/rpcauth but left references to the old path in code; this commit fixes the old references.

```
-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
git grep --files-with-matches 'share/rpcuser' src/*.cpp | xargs sed -i -E 's:share/rpcuser:share/rpcauth:g'
git grep --files-with-matches 'share/rpcuser' test/functional/*.py | xargs sed -i -E 's:share/rpcuser:share/rpcauth:g'
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-
```

events.body: @hkjn got time for a review? This is just a little cleanup from an old change of yours. Also tagging @laanwj who merged that one.
Can this be implemented as a scripted diff?
Thanks for review. @MarcoFalke I made the fixes you mentioned. @sipa itâ€™s now a scripted diff.

utACK c38d567

The only instances of `share/rpcuser` left in the code are in old release-notes, `doc/man` and `bitcoinstrings.cpp`

I also removed the reference to codemod from the PR description, as that isn't required.

utACK c38d567cbf25495fea7e941c75b3603e79d58061. Just noting that the scripted diff also modifies files that are not tracked by git. So I'd prefer to not do this 3-line change as a scripted diff, but I don't care either way.
utACK c38d567cbf25495fea7e941c75b3603e79d58061 modulo having the `scripted-diff` changed so that it only touches files tracked by `git` per @MarcoFalke:s feedback

events.message:
scripted-diff: Fix references to share/rpcuser (now share/rpcauth)

Commit 3fdb29778a0b598d4ddf05ec5ed4593641d0da6e renamed share/rpcuser to share/rpcauth but left references to the old path in code; this commit fixes the old references.

Performed update using https://github.com/facebook/codemod with command: `codemod --extensions cpp,py,md 'share/rpcuser' 'share/rpcauth'`

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
git grep --files-with-matches 'share/rpcuser' src/*.cpp | xargs sed -i -E 's:share/rpcuser:share/rpcauth:g'
git grep --files-with-matches 'share/rpcuser' test/functional/*.py | xargs sed -i -E 's:share/rpcuser:share/rpcauth:g'
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

events.body:
Ok. I restricted the script to only touch files in version control.

If someone could point me to a reference on the scripted diff concept I would appreciate it. I'm curious what it buys us in this case.

Here's a test plan:
1. pull changes
2. build
3. `src/bitcoind --help | grep "share/rpcuser"` comes up empty.
4. `src/bitcoind --help | grep "share/rpcauth"` produces:

       canonical python script is included in share/rpcauth. The client

utACK c64cc1b.

Thanks for the fix! (In the original commit 3fdb297 I `grep`ed for the `share/rpcuser.py` and `rpcuser.py` strings, but didn't think to look for references without the `.py` suffix..)

issue.title: commits from bitcoin/master
issue.body:
Change gitian-descriptors to use bionic instead
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13171

Trivial: fix references to share/rpcuser (now share/rpcauth)
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13664

rpc: Fix that CWallet::AbandonTransaction would leave the grandchildren, etc. active
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13652

Net: Bucketing INV delays (1 bucket) for incoming connections to hide tx time
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13298

Initialize m_next_send_inv_to_incoming
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13679

Add depends 32-bit arm support for bitcoin-qt
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13604

tests: Avoid read/write to default datadir
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13663

bench: Remove unused variable
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13682

Add scantxoutset RPC method
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/12196

Scripts and tools: Fix BIND_NOW check in security-check.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13647

[doc] Remove outdated comment about miner ignoring CPFP
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13680

tests: Use MAX_SCRIPT_ELEMENT_SIZE from script.py
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13638

Migrate gitian-build.sh to python
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13623

[moveonly] Extract MakeUnique into utilmemory.h
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13690

contrib: Clone core repo in gitian-build
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13692

contrib: correct version check
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13699

Modified in_addr6 cast in CConman class to work with msvc
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13672

travis: Check that ~/.bitcoin is never created
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13687

doc: Add release notes for -printtoconsole and -debuglogfile changes
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13625

bitcoinconsensus: invalid flags error should be set to bitcoinconsensus_err
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13655

BIP 174 PSBT Serializations and RPCs
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13557

[wallet] Decouple wallet version from client version
https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/13500
